title: Understanding
text: Alex needs to ensure that all entries in a column are formatted as dates. This means he needs a feature that can automatically check and enforce this format.

title: Picking a Feature
text: Consider the features available in spreadsheet software that can help enforce data formats. Think about features that can set rules or conditions for data entry.

hintAnswer: He should use the Data Validation feature.
title: Choosing the Right Feature
text: Which feature should Alex use if he wants to prevent incorrect data entry rather than just highlight it?

hintAnswer: He can set a rule that only allows date entries in the column.
title: Using the Correct Feature
text: What specific rule can Alex set in the Data Validation feature to ensure only dates are entered?
choices: Set a rule that only allows date entries in the column.
Set a rule that only allows text entries in the column.
Set a rule that only allows numeric entries in the column.
Set a rule that only allows time entries in the column.
